content:
BOOK YOUR STAY

Simply choose the checkin and checkout date, choose your room category, proceed and pay for your stay.

CHECK-IN

On the day of arrival you will automatically recieve a sms and email with your roomnumber and the pin code for your room.

CHECK-OUT

Leaving has never been easier, just leave and you will automatically check out of the building.

SELF SERVED

The hotel is automated without any reception. Meaning everything is self served.

SMS / EMAIL

The hotel has an automated messaging system where you will recieve all nessesary information by email and sms automatically.

CONTACT US

Even if we are fully automated without any receiption you can contact us by email and phone whenever you want.

OPENING HOURS

Mon-Sun 00:00 - 00:00

Those staying in the building has access to the hotel whenever they are staying.

There are no reception in the hotel, but our phone line is open all the time.
